程序包 com.project.smartcharge.service.impl

类 ComplexServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.project.smartcharge.service.impl.ComplexServiceImpl
所有已实现的接口:
ComplexService
@EnableAsync @Service("complexService") @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.project.smartcharge.config") public class ComplexServiceImpl extends Object implements ComplexService
复杂请求类接口的具体实现类，用于用户提出复杂请求的业务处理
